DOC.detailed_description: A pharmacokinetic study insulin pump treatment use Insulin Aspart . The study consist three different period A , B C constant insulin infusion rate give period . Each period last 12 hour blood drawn measure absorb Insulin Aspart . During period A constant infusion rate insulin give . In period B C start constant infusion rate give bolus . The bolus period C calculate basis result period B , therefore participant experience period C last period A B randomize cross-over . Period C write protocol optional evaluated period A B period C perform . The hypothesis steady state insulin obtain faster period B C A .
